title: PRX-T33 peeling (face&neck&decollete)
description: The PRX-T33 treatment - is the next generation of bio revitaliser for skin rejuvenation without injections and a long rehabilitation period.  The composition includes a modified molecule consisting of only three components - trichloroacetic acid (33%), hydrogen peroxide (H2O2) and kojic acid (5%), each component reinforces each other's strengths and neutralizes negative effects. Few chemical peel treatments compare in effectiveness when it comes to complete rejuvenation on the face or body, targeting skin texture, acne, wrinkles, laxity, and dull skin. ❗️It can be used even in summer❗️
